ygData.subject: Re: a few misc thoughts
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) There is no easy spot. ALL shadowmen spots spawn between 3 and 6 shadowmen, some you can t see. You will have to have a group to take them. 2) Good guards
ygData.messageBody:
1) There is no easy spot. ALL shadowmen spots spawn
between 3 and 6 shadowmen, some you can't see. You
will have to have a group to take them.

2) Good guards were recently upgraded in magic
resistance. There really are no good guards to pull
anymore. Rivervale wall guards are a maybe example,
east common guards are another maybe example. Find
corrupt guards to hunt.

3) honestly, I would recommnend 29 and the new spells
with a group to do the quests. I did them at 28 solo
on a young server and died 11 times doing all of the
quests. It will be easier on an established
server...but.... :)


Good hunting


Darkmoon Somberlight


--- Tony B <tonyb72@...> wrote:
> ok, here are some random issues-
>
> 1. i was looking at the temple/ro quests. where is
> a good place to pull
> shadowed men from? i know there are 5 in lavastorm,
> but ive been having
> trouble getting enough ppl to take the camp
> (especially with sol calling to
> them so nearby). is there a single spawn anywhere?
> im L25, btw, i believe
> that is sufficient.
>
> 2. guards- is there somewhere to pull guards? being
> evil and all, i would
> like to get some payback, but i got wasted looking
> around for something in
> RV yesterday. there were three guards that werent
> red, and one was green.
> the others were blue, but they were too close to the
> reds to attack- oh
> well.
>
> 3. what lvls does one need to be to take on the
> temple quests? i read an
> old post for the harvester, mentioning the writer
> was L35 at the time. is
> 25 high enough?
>
> thats it for now!
>
> Belphenor
